trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bismarck
There were no other sightings in Bismarck on or around August 18th 2009
Summary: single red pulsing light manovering slowly over south Bismarck,N.D.
divs: sighting detailson 8-18-9009 while in an upper room in my home i observed a single red pulsing light move in a slow and constant speed and altitude,make three directional changes at 90 degree angles from an apparently silent platform.this object was first noticed at aprox. 1000-2000 ft north of my home at an estimated altitude of 1000-1500 ft. the object traveled northwest aprox. 3 miles turned left 90 degrees and proceeded south for aprox. 3\4 of a mile then reversed coures and proceeded north aprox. 3\4 of a mile befor making a final 90 degree torn, again left, to return it to it's origional heading-north by northwest. the object continued on this course (traveling northwest) until it was no longer visible to me. i observed this objevt with a pair of bushnell 12x50 powre binoculars for nearly the entire duration of the event as they were in the same room i grabbed them very quickly. no f.a.a. lighting configurations were in use on this object. i would estimate the moving speed of this object at aprox. 35-40 m.p.h.
